#Indukcyjne metody analizy danych

__DAN, W8, PWr__

__C4.5- 2018__

This program performs C4.5 classifier on five datasets:
+ Wines
+ Diabetes
+ Iris
+ Abalone
+Glass
 
 `src.r` - calculates and visualises quality of classification for each dataset and certain parameters of the tree
